PPRProductRegistrationHelper

@objc
public class PPRProductRegistrationHelper : NSObject, JanrainFlowDownloadDelegate, UserRegistrationDelegate

This class is a wrapper on the Product Registration methods.

Since

1.0.0
  • delegate

    The delegate of a PPRProductRegistrationHelper must adopt to PPRRegisterProductDelegate.

    Since

    1.0.0

    @objc
